snippet: Colombia’s chief prosecutor’s office has opened a preliminary criminal investigation into former President Alvaro Uribe over allegations he sponsored a deadly far-right militia as a regional governor in the 1990s.
abstract: Colombia’s chief prosecutor’s office opens preliminary criminal investigation into allegations that former Pres Alvaro Uribe sponsored deadly far-right militia as regional governor in 1990s.
lead_paragraph: Colombia’s chief prosecutor’s office has opened a preliminary criminal investigation into former President Alvaro Uribe over allegations he sponsored a deadly far-right militia as a regional governor in the 1990s.

headline.seo: Colombia: Former President’s Ties to Militia Under Investigation
headline.main: Colombia: Former President’s Ties to Militia Under Investigation
headline.print_headline: Colombia: Former President’s Ties To Militia Under Investigation
